name: Throneless
description:
In the land of Mytheros, a plague has wrought turmoil upon the denizens of the kingdom. Lo, even the king has fallen prey to the blight, which twists the minds of its victims, leaving them maddened and foaming.

Until today... 

Three unlikely travelers step forth. Who will turn the tide and command the throneless Mytheros out of the depths of madness?

-------

LD48 Entry!

Throneless is an isometric pixel art rogue-tactics game where you control various heroes on a mission to the deepest dungeon in the kingdom of Mytheros to stop the source of an ever-looming plague.

Controls:

- Click on a character to select 

- Click tile positions or enemies to see interaction prompts

- Click "Advance" to watch the action play out.

- Step in at any time and give commands to friendly units.

- Convert defeated units to your cause, recruiting them to the party!
